Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Roger Maddocks
Dear Sir,
Roger Maddocks has nothing more to prove at AA !
He has an ERA of 2.54 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Status of Carlos Acosta
Dear Sir,
Carlos Acosta isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !

the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
